animeTitle: Seirei Tsukai no Blade Dance Specials
otherNames: 精霊使いの剣舞〈ブレイドダンス〉ミニOVA
synopsis: Mini specials bundled on each Blu-ray/DVD volume of Seirei Tsukai no Blade Dance. Each special is tied to the new 32-page short story that original light novel author Shimizu Yuu is writing for the limited first pressing of every Blu-ray/DVD volume.
